alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 24 at 4:14PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Salt Lake... southeastern Davis...south central Morgan...southwestern Summit and north central Utah Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 414 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Salt Lake, or near Murray, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Murray, Bountiful, Park City, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, Holladay, South Salt Lake, Herriman, North Salt Lake, Alpine and Bluffdale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 282 and 313. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 110 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
